sentence: Unilever NV ( UN ) will begin trading ex-dividend on February 15, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.378 per share is scheduled to be paid on March 21, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased UN prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -10.43% decrease from the prior dividend payment.
The previous trading day's last sale of UN was $54.08, representing a -12.24% decrease from the 52 week high of $61.62 and a 31.74% increase over the 52 week low of $41.05.
UN is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UN's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as 31.97%, compared to an industry average of 16.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UN Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
